entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
